content:
I’m a PhD candidate in the Department of Computer Science at the George Washington University (GWU) doing my research under supervision of Dr. Mona Diab and Dr. David Broniatowski.
My main areas of interest are Artificial intelligence (AI), Machine Learning (ML), and Natural Language Processing (NLP).

title: Pedram Hosseini
